page.title: 04CLUBS - YFC & WI
page.content: {The YFC A large number of the young people in the area go to the YFC which meets at the school every Thursday for 2 hours. Many come from over 4 miles away and most can drive. Of the 43 members ranging in age from 11 to 24 most go on to be farmers. At the club they have films, talks and competion work takes up a lot of their time. All the members still live with their parents and most will settle in the country. They appear a happy bunch, content to carry on in the family tradition. { The WI} The local Womens Institute has 22 members of which 75% are from farms. Most of them are quite young but few do not play a traditional roles in their families. They go to the WI for the company and the education that it offers.
